title: CollateralIssuerType
description: Represents a class to allow specification of the type of entity issuing the collateral.

issuerType.description: Specifies the origin of entity issuing the collateral.

supraNationalType.description: Specifies debt issued by international organisations and multilateral banks.

quasiGovernmentType.description: Specifies debt issues by institutions or bodies, typically constituted by statute, with a function mandated by the government and subject to government supervision inclusive of profit- and non-profit making bodies. Includes the US Agencies and GSEs and the EU concept of public sector entities. Excluding any entities which are also Regional Government.

regionalGovernmentType.description: Specifies Regional government, local authority or municipal.

specialPurposeVehicleType.description: Specifies a subsidiary company that is formed to undertake a specific business purpose of acquisition and financing of specific assets on a potentially limited recourse basis dependent of how it is designed. E.g. asset backed securities, including securitisations.
